dialogs.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Acid reflux, Doctor: ?
dialogs.doctor: Oh, do you have any Hard to swallow?

dialogs.patient: Well not in my knowledge, Doctor: ?
No, I never had anything like that., Doctor: ?
dialogs.doctor: In that case, do you have any Stomach ache?

dialogs.patient: No, I never had anything like that., Doctor: ?
dialogs.doctor: In that case, do you have any Thin?

dialogs.patient: No, I never had anything like that., Doctor: ?
dialogs.doctor: What about Burning sensation behind the breastbone?
In that case, you have Esophagitis.

gpt3_output.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Acid reflux.
gpt3_output.doctor: Hi there. Can you tell me when did you first experience this symptom?

gpt3_output.patient: It started a few weeks ago.
gpt3_output.doctor: How often do you experience this symptom?

gpt3_output.patient: It happens several times a day.
Yes, I have been having difficulty eating.
gpt3_output.doctor: Are there any other symptoms you experience in conjunction with the acid reflux?

gpt3_output.patient: Yes, I often experience chest pain and a burning sensation in my throat.
gpt3_output.doctor: Based on your symptoms, it appears that you may have Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD). I would recommend that you see a Gastroenterologist for further testing.

issue: The GPT3 doesn't ask further questions that will help diagnose the disease and gives an output after the first prompt itself.
improvement: The GPT-3 doesn't just randomly diagnose the disease and actually asks relevant questions and also comes up with a diagnosis only after considering all the symptoms. The questions are also very specific and covers up a lot of information at once
